Does living in Big Cities offer benefits in comparison to rural areas? What can be done to minimize the disparity between rural and urban areas in India?

People living in big cities most definitely enjoy several benefits which are not available for people living in rural areas & most of them are living a life in obscurity & are completely oblivious to the contemporary ways of the world living in  Big cities.

Be it in terms of the job oppurunities ( of your domain), Good salary package, realisation of dreams, a luxurious life, all of these  are only to be found in Big Cities.

 The job oppurtunities  that we find in cities & the freedom to express oneself  in one's specific area of interest & pursue the job of your dreams can only come true in cities. To put plan to action . there can be no other place than the cities.

To minimize the disparity between them, i firmly believe that the government needs to play a strong role. It needs to provide the infrastructure that will help the people residing in rural areas experience a life that is currently being experienced by the people living in cities.

By building Colleges, employing teachers that have tremendous connaissance of the subject thats they are teaching rather than just being show-pieces & just doing the job for the very sake of it. 

Also by providing wholesome education & skill development , so that the students studying in rural areas grow holistically.A comprehensive education plan needs to be put into place comprising all those things which the students studying in urban areas get & so that they dont feel isolated when they make the transition from rural to Urban.

We have seen a technology boom in the contemporay world, so the governmet must ensure people in rural areas are not deprived of the technical education & are able to match step-to step with the people living in Urban areas.

Absence of job oppurtunties, the domain in which a person aspires to be . for instance IT, Media there should be scope for people to apply in such domains.

The people in urban areas are far better equipped to handle pressure situations then those in rural areas simply beacuse of the world-class education that is provied in their respective domains.

Also i believe, It is the duty of those priveleged & residing in urban areas to contribute as much as they can via funding to the government or by any other means to help the rural areas develop better infrastructure & sanitation, which is indispensable for the proper growth of the people in rural areas.
